The 2010 cycle was full of surprises, and it turns out 2012 will have some twists and turns as well: The first Senate retirement is a Republican, said Eric Schmidt , communications director for the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee. "We look forward to running a competitive race in Texas as the Lone Star State is now one of several Democratic pickup opportunities next November."

http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_19pts_vs_Nets_08/09_NBA_*Clutch_Plays Allen Iverson and Tayshaun Prince stepped up for the short-handed Detroit Pistons. Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Mike D'Antoni Curry said. "Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up."
